component.name: GridPanelExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.panelSize = "wide" 'm.top.isFullScreen = true 'm.top.leftPosition = 130 m.top.focusable = true m.top.hasNextPanel = true 'm.top.createNextPanelOnItemFocus = true
m.top.optionsAvailable = false
m.top.grid = m.top.findNode("examplePosterGrid")
m.top.grid.observeField("itemFocused", "makeThisLeft") end sub
sub readpostergrid() m.readPosterGridTask = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentReader") m.readPosterGridTask.contenturi = m.top.gridcontenturi m.readPosterGridTask.observeField("content", "showpostergrid") m.readPosterGridTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub showpostergrid() m.top.grid.content = m.readPosterGridTask.content m.top.overhangTitle = m.top.overhangtext end sub
sub makeThisLeft() m.top.leftPosition = 130 end sub
